channel.title: Brand Authenticity on Ava Francesca Battocchio
channel.description: Recent content in Brand Authenticity on Ava Francesca Battocchio

item.title: Building Brand Authenticity on Social Media: The Impact of Instagram Ad Model Genuineness and Trustworthiness on Perceived Brand Authenticity and Consumer Responses
item.description: Smiling faces and snapshot aesthetics on Instagram boost perceived source genuineness, enhancing brand authenticity, trust, and consumer intentions.

item.title: Effects of Transparent Brand Communication on Perceived Brand Authenticity and Consumer Responses
item.description: Brands' transparent communication about production and costs boosts consumers' perceptions of transparency, authenticity, trust, and intentions
